laboratory_examinations.findings: Cerebral edema associated with abnormal deep white matter signal changes.
Large enhancing lesion in the left cerebellar peduncle, vermis, and medulla oblongata, along with effacement of the fourth ventricle and obstructive hydrocephalus.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressed from initial edema to a large enhancing lesion.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Demonstrated brief electrographic seizures with left temporal origin.
Demonstrated cerebellar patchy enhancement and abnormally enhancing foci bilaterally in the frontal and parietal subcortical white matter.
